## Freedom & Perception

> The best slave is the one who thinks he is free.
> 
> Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

> Every accusation is a confession.
>
> Anonymous

## Change & Action

> Philosophers have only interpreted the world, in various ways; the point, however, is to change it.
> 
> Karl Marx

## Vision & Strategy

> 不谋万世者，不足谋一时；不谋全局者，不足谋一域。
>
> 陈澹然

> It is hallowed by no traditions; it is hampered by none. Its finger posts all point forward.
>
> David Starr Jordan, first president of Stanford University

> 剧是必须从序幕开始的，但序幕还不是高潮。
> 
> 毛泽东

> 一张白纸，没有负担，好写最新最美的文字，好画最新最美的画图。
>
> 毛泽东

## Practical Wisdom & Problem Solving

> Smart data structures and dumb code works a lot better than the other way around.
> 
> Jon Bentley, Peter Norvig

## Personal Takes

> We are all products of evolution, living within a universe-scale genetic algorithm. Each of us emerges with a unique combination of genotypes and phenotypes, shaped by countless mutations and diverging paths.
> 
> But we are not mere subjects of blind selection.
> 
> Through wisdom and relentless effort, we have the extraordinary ability to understand and bend the fitness function that governs our fate.
>
> Jifeng Wu
